casebody.data:
EDWIN M. WILMER v. HERBERT L. GRYMES. Decided November 6th, 1925.

Tbe cause was submitted on briefs to Bond, C. J., Patti-■son, Henee, Adkins, Oeeutt, Digges, Pabke. and Walsh, JJ.

Edwin M. Wilmer, for the appellant. Philip B. Perlman, for the appellee. Urner, J.,

delivered tbe opinion of tbe Court, affirming tbe judgment, with costs.
